dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5019 IH: Cut the Climate Czar’s Carbon Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To limit the salaries and certain travel expenses of the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cut the Climate Czar’s Carbon Act.

section.header: Limitation on salaries and certain travel expenses of Special Presidential Envoy for Climate

subsection.text: No Federal funds may be used for the salary of the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate or any employee of the Executive Office of the President working for, or on behalf of, such Special Presidential Envoy.

No Federal funds may be used for the official travel of the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate or any such employee unless the Special Presidential envoy or such employee purchases, using personal funds, offsetting emissions reductions for such travel.
